alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 09 at 4:36AM AKDT until April 09 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in falling and blowing snow. * WHERE...Through Portage Valley and Whittier. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds and snow will increase this morning with the heaviest snow and strongest winds expected this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
